rules_text:
At the beginning of the next end step, amass X, where X is the number of artifacts and creatures that died this turn. [i](To amass X, where X, create X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a X, where. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black X, where Army creature token first.)[/i]
Draw a card.
